name: Flight Delay Prediction
desc: Used Python and key libraries like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, and scikit-learn to predict flight delays.

name: Calorie Burnt Prediction
desc: Built an XGBoost machine learning model predicting calories burnt, leveraging Jupyter Notebooks and Python libraries for data preprocessing and accurate results.

name: ExpendLight
desc: Using React.js, Firebase, and Google OAuth built an expense tracker that allows for safe login and real-time tracking while also providing a responsive, user-friendly interface with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

name: IPL Winning Prediction
desc: Built an IPL win probability predictor using logistic regression, leveraging ball-by-ball data from 2009-2024. Deployed via Streamlit, achieving 81% accuracy with Pandas, NumPy, and Pickle.

name: HealthPro+ : Diet and Fitness Planning Management Website
desc: Designed a frontend of a website named Heathpro+, a diet and fitness management website, using HTML, CSS and JavaScript that will track the user's overall health habits.

name: Analysis of Smartphones Sales Data of Flipkart
desc: Performed data cleaning and manipulation, and exploratory data analysis using pandas, matplotlib, and seaborn libraries. Improved sales by identifying most selling brand and different specifications.

name: HospitEase
desc: It offers an intuitive interface and sensure a seamless user experience

name: E-Commerce sales Dashboard
desc: Technology Used - Microsoft Power BI, CSV, Kaggle. Created an interactive online sales data amalysis dasboard.

name: Rock vs Mine Prediction
desc: Technology Used - Machine Learning, Python, Logistic Regression Model, Jupyter Notebooks, Sklearn, Pandas, Numpy, CSV. Utilized Python to develop a system for classifying objects as either rocks or mines using SONAR data.
